themes: Overreliance on HOT (Hotel Occupancy Tax) for arts funding
Tourism marketing requirements for individual artists and small organizations
Inappropriate grant scoring based on neighborhood of applicant
key_phrases: Find ways to fund the arts besides HOT
shouldn't be required to figure out how to market to tourists on the Nexus grant
Only venues should be required to market to the public
Scoring grant applications based on the neighborhood the applicant lives in, doesn't make sense to me
barriers_identified: Requirement for individual artists and small orgs to market to tourists
Grant scoring based on applicant's neighborhood
solutions_proposed: Find alternative funding sources beyond HOT
Remove tourism marketing requirement for individual artists and small orgs on the Nexus grant
Require only venues to market to the public
Stop scoring grant applications based on neighborhood
